plot: Twelve people move about four marked paths on the condition that their movements and trajectories resemble one another as much as possible; movement becomes autonomous, time is transformed, all in one shot.
title: 57.600 secondi di notte e luce invisibili
plot_es: Twelve people move about four marked paths on the condition that their movements and trajectories resemble one another as much as possible; movement becomes autonomous, time is transformed, all in one shot.
original_name: 57.600 secondi di notte e luce invisibili
plot_en: Twelve people move about four marked paths on the condition that their movements and trajectories resemble one another as much as possible; movement becomes autonomous, time is transformed, all in one shot.
